content: You’re trying to moralize whether the sexually selected traits in male sexual desire are good or bad by framing a biological imperative terms of socialization, culture, patriarchy, etc. Evolution does not care what you think is good. You are implicitly trying to shame male heterosexuality as bad because it doesn’t operate the way you think it should — like female sexuality. It’s very puritanical and will ultimately just lead to you suffering, not men.
